title: Casdon DeLonghi Microwave. Toy Replica of DeLonghi’s ‘Infinito’ Microwave for Children Aged 3+. Featuring Flashing LED’s, Sounds & More, Blue
description: Complete with a rotating turntable, flashing LEDs, cooking sounds and buttons, the DeLonghi Microwave has everything your little one needs to turn into a cooking extraordinaire! The DeLonghi ‘Infinito’ Microwave looks just like the real thing. It has more than enough gizmos for hours of imaginative play and even comes with four pieces of play food to add some excitement to the menu. Whether your little one fancies a quick pizza or a full roast chicken, all it takes is a few buttons and ‘pings’ to cook (or grill!) to perfection. This toy microwave will certainly be a popular addition to your little one’s kitchen, enhancing role-play and sparking a love for home cooking. Whether mesmerised by the rotating turntable or enjoying the thrill from the microwave’s ‘pings’, this is undoubtedly a toy that makes household jobs as exciting as can be!
